name: middleware-async
description: A handy tool to work with async/promise express middleware
author: Tran Sang <me@transa.ng>

scripts.build:es: yarn tsc -d --skipLibCheck --target es5 --declaration false --moduleResolution node --module es6 --outDir es --sourceMap index.ts && sed -i '$s/index.js.map/index.mjs.map/' es/index.js && mv es/index.js.map index.mjs.map && mv es/index.js index.mjs && rm -rf es
scripts.build:commonjs: yarn tsc -d --skipLibCheck --target es5 --declaration --moduleResolution node --module commonjs --outDir . --sourceMap index.ts
scripts.clean: rm -rf index.d.ts index.js index.js.map index.mjs index.js.map es coverage
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn clean && yarn lint && yarn coverage && yarn clean && yarn build
